default_values.description: Buy these products together and get a discount!!

bundle_name.label: Bundle Name
bundle_name.help_text: Bundle name will be visible on invoices.

bundle_title.label: Title
bundle_title.help_text: Title will be displayed on product pages.

description.label: Description
description.help_text: Description will be displayed on product pages under bundle title.

discount.label: Percentage discount
discount.help_text: Set the percentage discount which will be applied to each product in the bundle. You can set it to 0% if you want to create a bundle without a discount.

products.title: Discounted products in bundle
products.help_text: Select the products you want to offer in the bundle. It is recommended to select only a handful of product (e.g. 2 - 4 products), as smaller bundles will be rendered faster and won't overwhelm your customers.
products.warning: You have to select at least one product if you want to save the bundle.

auto_bundle.title: Automatic Bundle Generation
auto_bundle.description: The discount will be applied automatically when it meets the conditions you set.

toasts.error: Error while saving data, try changing fields before saving

minimum_price.label: Minimum price
minimum_price.help_text: Minimum price of product to include in the bundle

maximum_price.label: Maximum price
maximum_price.help_text: Maximum price of product to include in the bundle

minimum_products.label: Minimum products to buy
minimum_products.help_text: Minimum number of products customer need to buy to get a discount
